titleStmt.title: A paraphrase upon the Canticles, and some select hymns of the New and Old Testament with other occasional compositions in English verse / by Samuel Woodford ...
titleStmt.author: Woodford, Samuel, 1636-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for John Baker ... and Henry Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Includes "A paraphrase on the Canticles" and "A paraphrase upon some select hymns of the New and Old Testament", with separate paging, with some other occasional compositions in English rimes.
